attributes.action: publicly support the London Mayors proposed emissions related congestion charge and encourage real debate with Porsche UK on their stance against it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Urban 4x4's get a lot of negative publicity, but many others cars have just as high emissions. The Mayors scheme addresses this issue and makes the polluter pay. If Porsche UK have any argument to justify why we should be free to drive such heavily polluting vehicles on urban roads, then please tell us not via a judicial review but through open debate with those in favour of the Mayors scheme.
